Description: Rim and wall sherd of probably South Ionian pottery plate; slipped cream on inside; on top of rim, between bands shallow zig-zag with fill of Ts; on outside of floor, between broad bands with traces of added colour, hook maeanders; traces of decoration towards the centre - rosette and dotted circle; outside and part of underside of rim glazed; four bands, some perhaps in, or with, added red, on exterior wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.306)
